children.value: I always loved working with maps and GIS solutions, but I'm not very convinced by the existing map managers that you can find online. So I made my own Map application blueprint based on the finest technologies on the market :
as the WebGL Map engine with GeoJSON support out of the box. I also use
to offer an easy and light data management.
